verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> in the <S%G4003>fifteenth<s%> <S%G2094>year<s%> of the <S%G2231>reign<s%> of <S%G5086>Tiberius<s%> <S%G2541>Caesar,<s%> <S%G4194>Pontius<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> being <S%G2230>governor<s%> of <S%G2449>Judaea,<s%> and <S%G2264>Herod<s%> being <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of <S%G2484>Ituraea<s%> and of the <S%G5561>region<s%> of <S%G5139>Trachonitis,<s%> and <S%G3078>Lysanias<s%> the <S%G5075>tetrarch<s%> of <S%G9>Abilene,<s%>

<S%G452>Annas<s%> and <S%G2533>Caiaphas<s%> <S%G1909>being<s%> the <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priests,<s%> the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> to <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2197>Zacharias<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness.<s%>

And he <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4066>country<s%> <S%G4066>about<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> <S%G2784>preaching<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> for the <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins;<s%>

As it is <S%G1125>written<s%> in the <S%G976>book<s%> of the <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G2268>Esaias<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> The <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2090>Prepare<s%> you the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> his <S%G5147>paths<s%> <S%G2117>straight.<s%>

<S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G5327>valley<s%> shall be <S%G4137>filled,<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3735>mountain<s%> and <S%G1015>hill<s%> shall be <S%G5013>brought<s%> <S%G5013>low;<s%> and the <S%G4646>crooked<s%> shall be <S%G1519>made<s%> <S%G2117>straight,<s%> and the <S%G5138>rough<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%> shall be <S%G1519>made<s%> <S%G3006>smooth;<s%>
And <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> shall <S%G3700>see<s%> the <S%G4992>salvation<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> he to the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> that <S%G1607>came<s%> <S%G1607>forth<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized<s%> of him, O <S%G1081>generation<s%> of <S%G2191>vipers,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G5263>warned<s%> you to <S%G5343>flee<s%> from the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> to <S%G3195>come?<s%>

<S%G4160>Bring<s%> <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2590>fruits<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance,<s%> and <S%G756>begin<s%> not to <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> We <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> to our <S%G3962>father:<s%> for I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, That <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%> to <S%G1453>raise<s%> up <S%G5043>children<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

And <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G513>ax<s%> is <S%G2749>laid<s%> to the <S%G4491>root<s%> of the <S%G1186>trees:<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1186>tree<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> which <S%G4160>brings<s%> not <S%G4160>forth<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> is <S%G1581>hewn<s%> <S%G1581>down,<s%> and <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4442>fire.<s%>
And the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%>

He <S%G611>answers<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, He that <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5509>coats,<s%> let him <S%G3330>impart<s%> to him that <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3361>none;<s%> and he that <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1033>meat,<s%> let him <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3668>likewise.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5057>publicans<s%> to be <S%G907>baptized,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1320>Master,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall we <S%G4160>do?<s%>
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G4238>Exact<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G4119>more<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> that which is <S%G1299>appointed<s%> you.

And the <S%G4754>soldiers<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> <S%G1905>demanded<s%> of him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> And <S%G5101>what<s%> shall we <S%G4160>do?<s%> And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G1286>Do<s%> <S%G1286>violence<s%> to <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>man,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G4811>accuse<s%> any falsely; and be <S%G714>content<s%> with <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3800>wages.<s%>

And as the <S%G2992>people<s%> were in <S%G4328>expectation,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G1260>mused<s%> in their <S%G2588>hearts<s%> of <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3379>whether<s%> he were the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> or not;

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them <S%G537>all,<s%> I <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G907>baptize<s%> you with <S%G5204>water;<s%> but one <S%G2478>mightier<s%> than I <S%G2064>comes,<s%> the <S%G2438>lace<s%> of <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5266>shoes<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> not <S%G2425>worthy<s%> to <S%G3089>unloose:<s%> he shall <S%G907>baptize<s%> you with the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> and with <S%G4442>fire:<s%>

<S%G3739>Whose<s%> <S%G4425>fan<s%> is in his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and he will <S%G1245>thoroughly<s%> <S%G1245>purge<s%> his <S%G257>floor,<s%> and will <S%G4863>gather<s%> the <S%G4621>wheat<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G596>garner;<s%> but the <S%G892>chaff<s%> he will <S%G2618>burn<s%> with <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G762>unquenchable.<s%>
And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> things in his <S%G3870>exhortation<s%> <S%G2097>preached<s%> he to the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

But <S%G2264>Herod<s%> the <S%G5076>tetrarch,<s%> being <S%G1651>reproved<s%> by him for <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip's<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> and for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4190>evils<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> had <S%G4160>done,<s%>
<S%G4369>Added<s%> <S%G2596>yet<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1909>above<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> that he <S%G2623>shut<s%> up <S%G2491>John<s%> in <S%G5438>prison.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1722>when<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G537>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> were <S%G907>baptized,<s%> it <S%G1096>came<s%> to pass, that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> being <S%G907>baptized,<s%> and <S%G4336>praying,<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G455>opened,<s%>

And the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> in a <S%G4984>bodily<s%> <S%G1491>shape<s%> <S%G5616>like<s%> a <S%G4058>dove<s%> on him, and a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> which <S%G3004>said,<s%> You <S%G1488>are<s%> my <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G5207>Son;<s%> in you I am <S%G2106>well<s%> <S%G2106>pleased.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to be <S%G5616>about<s%> <S%G5144>thirty<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> of age, <S%G5607>being<s%> (as was <S%G3543>supposed)<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2242>Heli,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3158>Matthat,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3017>Levi,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3197>Melchi,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2388>Janna,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3161>Mattathias,<s%> which was the son of <S%G301>Amos,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3486>Naum,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2069>Esli,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3477>Nagge,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3092>Maath,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3161>Mattathias,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4584>Semei,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2455>Juda,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G2489>Joanna,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4488>Rhesa,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2216>Zorobabel,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4528>Salathiel,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3518>Neri,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3197>Melchi,<s%> which was the son of <S%G78>Addi,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2973>Cosam,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1678>Elmodam,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2262>Er,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G2499>Jose,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1663>Eliezer,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2497>Jorim,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3158>Matthat,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3017>Levi,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G4826>Simeon,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2455>Juda,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2501>Joseph,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2494>Jonan,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1662>Eliakim,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3190>Melea,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3104>Menan,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3160>Mattatha,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3481>Nathan,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1138>David,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G2421>Jesse,<s%> which was the son of <S%G5601>Obed,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1003>Booz,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4533>Salmon,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3476>Naasson,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G284>Aminadab,<s%> which was the son of <S%G689>Aram,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2074>Esrom,<s%> which was the son of <S%G5329>Phares,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2455>Juda,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> which was the son of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2291>Thara,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3493>Nachor,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G4562>Saruch,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4466>Ragau,<s%> which was the son of <S%G5317>Phalec,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1443>Heber,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4527>Sala,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G2536>Cainan,<s%> which was the son of <S%G742>Arphaxad,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4590>Sem,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3575>Noe,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2984>Lamech,<s%>

Which was the son of <S%G3103>Mathusala,<s%> which was the son of <S%G1802>Enoch,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2391>Jared,<s%> which was the son of <S%G3121>Maleleel,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2536>Cainan,<s%>
Which was the son of <S%G1800>Enos,<s%> which was the son of <S%G4589>Seth,<s%> which was the son of <S%G76>Adam,<s%> which was the son of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
